Class ConnectionBorrowerStatsDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DelegatingDataSource
      • com.navis.framework.persistence.ConnectionBorrowerStatsDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBorrowStats, java.sql.Wrapper, javax.sql.CommonDataSource, javax.sql.DataSource, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TomcatCpStatsDataSource, TomcatCpStatsDataSource, UcpStatsDataSource

    public class ConnectionBorrowerStatsDataSource
extends org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DelegatingDataSource
implements IBorrowStats
    A DelegatingDataSource that collects statistics about requests to obtain connections
    Author:
    Marty Ross
